scripts.build-stylesheets: npm run make-build-dir && postcss -c config/postcss.json -d staticfiles/build staticfiles/stylesheets/app.css
scripts.watch-stylesheets: npm run make-build-dir && postcss -w -c config/postcss.json -d staticfiles/build staticfiles/stylesheets/app.css
scripts.build-javascripts: npm run make-build-dir && browserify staticfiles/javascripts/app.js > staticfiles/build/app.js
scripts.watch-javascripts: npm run make-build-dir && watchify staticfiles/javascripts/app.js -o staticfiles/build/app.js -dv
scripts.watch: npm run watch-javascripts & npm run watch-stylesheets & npm run livereload
scripts.build: npm run build-javascripts && npm run build-stylesheets
